When to get help
Most small babies strain and 
go red in the face, or even cry, 
when passing a stool. This is 
normal and doesn’t mean they 
are constipated as long as 
the stools are soft. If you are 
worried that your baby may be 
constipated, mention this to 
your midwife or health visitor.
What	you	find	in	your	baby’s
